$ZIM The market seems to be ignoring what appears to be a completely glossed-over statement by ZIM in their last release that they were adjusting their focus on long term leases as the market dynamics shift... This small statement has huge implications for ZIM in this environment... It means ZIM is not just standing still as market characteristics change
created_at: they're being flexible and adapting to actual current and forecasted market conditions on the ground... The assumption that ZIM will lean as heavily on spot rates as it has during the previous unprecedented pandemic-fueled period is a simply an erroneous paradigm...
